description: Challenge your mind with the ultimate logic-based number placement classic.
rationale: Sudoku is a globally recognized puzzle that sharpens logical thinking and pattern recognition. It is an ideal environment for AI agents to practice constraint satisfaction problems and deductive reasoning within a structured grid.
details: The game is a simplified 9x9 Sudoku grid. It features a minimalist UI with monochromatic styling. The grid is partially filled with numbers (1-9). The player must fill the empty cells such that each row, each column, and each of the nine 3x3 subgrids contain all of the digits from 1 to 9 without repetition. The game includes a basic validation system to check for conflicts and a completion trigger when the grid is successfully filled. It uses a seed-based generator to ensure reproducible boards for testing.

game_rules.winning_condition: All cells filled correctly according to Sudoku rules
game_rules.losing_condition: None (logic puzzle, no time limit by default)
game_rules.constraints: No duplicate numbers in any row, column, or 3x3 box

how_to_stop: kill the process or press the ESC key during the game loop
how_to_play: Use the mouse to click on an empty cell to select it. Press numeric keys (1-9) to input a number into the selected cell. Press 'Backspace' or '0' to clear a cell. Score increases by 10 points for every correct number placed and decreases by 5 points for every invalid move (conflict). The goal is to reach the maximum score by completing the board perfectly.
